title: The Girl with No Shoes
description: This book is no longer available.The path is wide, the grass grows high on either side. It is the path that Arielle follows with her dog Britches when they go to their secret place in the woods.Discover your passion with B.J. Rand’s inspirational debut, The Girl with No Shoes.Arielle is a young girl who, with her dog, Britches, and her cat, Nosey, explore their secret hideaway called “The Hollow.”But one day, Arielle and her companions encounter a young girl sitting all alone in The Hollow—and without any shoes!The girl’s name is Francesca, but she is soon summoned out of the woods by an angry voice. Before she goes, however, she promises to come back to The Hollow the very next day.The group becomes fast friends, and Arielle, Nosey, and Britches make it their mission to find Francesca a suitable pair of shoes.Soon they come across a pair of shoes for Francesca.Francesca promises to repay her friend's kindness by taking them on a magical journey to the place where magic began.
author: B.J. Rand
